name: Happy-fridays
tagline: a Grails application to organise "happy-fridays" at the office
body:
# Feel free to contribute !

## Things to add/improve
* make the UI responsive (should be easy with the twitter-bootstrap) 
* **HOT!** : secure the access to the admin pages
* RSS feed !
* ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
